Title: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Writer: Steve Box (screenplay by), Nick Park (screenplay by), Mark Burton (screenplay by), Bob Baker (screenplay by), Nick Park (based on characters created by)
Actors: Peter Sallis, Ralph Fiennes, Helena Bonham Carter, Peter Kay
Plot: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.
